description.@value: Today we would like to make a salad "Yummy Italian". Simple, delicious and hearty salad with chicken recommend You strongly to taste. I hope that you will appreciate this recipe, and salad "Yummy Italian" will decorate your festive table. Nice presentation, very attractive appearance, exquisite taste – the main advantage of this dish.

ingredients.@value:
Chicken breast
                                                    
                                    
                                        Crab sticks
                                                    
                                    
                                        Tomato
                                                    
                                    
                                        Pepper
                                                    
                                    
                                        Cheese
                                                    
                                    
                                        Chicken egg
                                                    
                                    
                                        Mayonnaise
